problem_text_cn: 如图,小惠家(图中点O处)门前有一条东西走向的公路,测得一水塔(图中点A处),在她家北偏东60°方向600米处,那么他所在位置到公路的距离AB为()米．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is an east-west road in front of Xiaohui's house (point O in the figure), and a water tower (point A in the figure) is measured. It is at N_1 in the direction N_0 to the east of her house, then the distance AB from his location to the road is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了解直角三角形的应用-方向角问题,正确记忆三角函数的定义是解决本题的关键．
